oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Friday Night Show - 1947-12-05 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 1947-12-05 broadcast of WSM's Friday Night Show (part 1). Featuring Eddie Birnbryer (MC), The Dixie Dons, Frank Melfi, Art Mooney, The Galley Sisters (Norma, Dolly, Eleanor), Jane Dabney, Elmer Alley, Buddy Brees, and Owen Bradley and his orchestra The Friday Night Showmen. Introduced by Ernie Keller.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Birnbryer; Frank Melfi; Dixie Dons; Art Mooney; Galley Sisters; Buddy Brees; Owen Bradley; Friday Night Showmen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Introduction -- Theme -- Opening statement (Ernie Keller) -- Eddie Birnbryer opens the show -- Let It Snow (The Dixie Dons) -- Comedy routine (Eddie Birnbryer, Frank Melfi) -- Eddie Birnbryer introduces Art Mooney and The Galley Sisters -- Big Brass Band From Brazil (Art Mooney, The Galley Sisters) -- Eddie Birnbryer introduces Buddy Brees -- Near You (Owen Bradley And The Friday Night Showmen, Buddy Brees) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Friday night show (Radio program); Bradley, Owen; Friday Night Showmen (Musical group); Mooney, Art; Keller, Ernie; Galley Sisters (Musical group); Brees, Buddy (Vocalist); Brasfield, Rod; Birnbryer, Eddie; Dixie Dons (Musical group); Melfi, Frank; Dabney, Jane; Alley, Elmer
